item.title: Scatterplot
item.description: Here we can see how to make our own Scatterplot! First, we have to install the following pakages: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(ggplot2) When we installed the pakages, we are going to find the career of homeruns and strikeouts from players who had more than 400 homeruns. query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR) AS career_HR,sum(SO) AS career_so FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>=400" result<-sqldf(query) To make a graph we would have to use ggplot2. You can also use diffrent colors and sizes.
